text: "Love Hurts" is a 1960 song by The Everly Brothers. It was taken from their fourth studio album A Date with the Everly Brothers. The song was covered by Roy Orbison in 1961. That version went to number 5 in Australia. The song was covered again by Scottish rock band Nazareth in 1974 as a hard rock and blues rock track. That version went to number 8 in the United States, number 41 in the United Kingdom, number 4 in New Zealand and topped the single charts in South Africa, Canada, the Netherlands, Norway and Belgium. The song was also covered by Cher as the title track to her 20th studio album Love Hurts. ==References== Category:1960 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:The Everly Brothers songs Category:The Who songs Category:Roy Orbison songs Category:Jennifer Warnes songs Category:Emmylou Harris songs Category:Don McLean songs Category:Nazareth (band) songs Category:Joan Jett and The Blackhearts songs Category:Cher songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Pat Boone songs Category:Heart (band) songs
